title: Smart Suburb Finder
description: A full-stack web application that helps users find the perfect Melbourne suburb based on their budget and lifestyle needs. Features AI-powered recommendations and real-time data analysis.

title: E-commerce GYM Website
description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform for gym equipment retailers with inventory management, payment processing, and customer analytics. Features user authentication, product catalog, and admin panel.

title: Event Management Mobile App
description: A feature-rich Android application for event planning with location services, social media integration, and push notifications. Users can create, discover, and join events with mapping and calendar sync.
